Name: Indeep | The casual dungeon crawler
About the game: In this classical dungeon crawler you delve into 10 floors of finest dungeon crawling. Collect more than 20 items, and fight aginst more than 20 enemies and bosses. Master more than 10 spells and be the first adventurerer who reach the the end of the dungeon. FACTS: * 10 Floors * 20+ Monsters * 20+ Items * 10+ Spells * Save at any time
